20 
21 #include "QtDcmDcm2niiSettingsWidget.h"
22 #include <QtDcmPreferences.h>
23 
24 class QtDcmDcm2niiSettingsWidgetPrivate
25 {
26 public:
27  QtDcmPreferences * preferences;
28 };
29 
30 QtDcmDcm2niiSettingsWidget::QtDcmDcm2niiSettingsWidget(QWidget* parent): QWidget(parent), d(new QtDcmDcm2niiSettingsWidgetPrivate)
31 {
32  this->setupUi(this);
33  d->preferences = NULL;
34 
35  QObject::connect(browseDcm2niiButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(browseDcm2niiPath()));
36  QObject::connect(dcm2niiCheckBox, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)), this, SLOT(toggleDcm2niiFrame(int)));
37 }
38 
39 QtDcmPreferences* QtDcmDcm2niiSettingsWidget::getPreferences()
40 {
41  return d->preferences;
42 }
43 
44 void QtDcmDcm2niiSettingsWidget::setPreferences(QtDcmPreferences* prefs)
45 {
46  d->preferences = prefs;
47 
48  dcm2niiCheckBox->setChecked(d->preferences->useDcm2nii());
49  dcm2niiLineEdit->setText( d->preferences->getDcm2niiPath());
50 }
51 
52 void QtDcmDcm2niiSettingsWidget::updatePreferences()
53 {
54  d->preferences->setDcm2niiPath(dcm2niiLineEdit->text());
55  d->preferences->useDcm2nii (dcm2niiCheckBox->isChecked());
56 
57  d->preferences->writeSettings();
58 }
59 
60 void QtDcmDcm2niiSettingsWidget::browseDcm2niiPath()
61 {
62  // Open aa QFileDialog in directory mode.
63  QFileDialog * dialog = new QFileDialog(this);
64  dialog->setFileMode(QFileDialog::ExistingFile);
65 #ifdef Q_OS_UNIX
66  dialog->setNameFilter(tr("Dcm2nii (dcm2nii)"));
67 #else
68  dialog->setNameFilter(tr("Dcm2nii (dcm2nii.exe)"));
69 #endif
70  dialog->setDirectory(QDir::home().dirName());
71  dialog->setWindowTitle("Choose dcm2nii path");
72  QString filename;
73  if (dialog->exec())
74  {
75  filename = dialog->selectedFiles()[0];
76  }
77  dialog->close();
78  if (!filename.isEmpty()) // A file has been chosen
79  {
80  // The the output directory to the manager and launch the conversion process
81  d->preferences->setDcm2niiPath(filename);
82  dcm2niiLineEdit->setText(filename);
83  }
84 }
85 
86 void QtDcmDcm2niiSettingsWidget::toggleDcm2niiFrame(int state)
87 {
88  dcm2niiPathFrame->setEnabled((state == Qt::Checked));
89  d->preferences->useDcm2nii((state == Qt::Checked));
90 }
